description: Real-world multi-file bug fixes and improvements mined from the PyTorch repository, evaluating an agent's ability to make coordinated changes across multiple files in a large Python codebase
note: Both baseline and MCP agents have full repository access; scip_indexed is false so SCIP-based MCP tools provide no advantage on this benchmark
